last_episode_to_air.name: The Shock Team
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dwayne finds Handy's jet pack in the forest and takes it to make his own. Handy must then put together a team to go get it from Gargamel, but the only Smurfs available are not the ones Handy was thinking of...

name: The Smurfs
overview: Blue and small, standing only three apples high, the Smurfs might be hard to tell apart at first. However, each Smurf is a distinct individual with his or her own personality, their names say it all

episodes.name: Who Nose?
episodes.overview: Hefty casts a spell that accidentally turns him into a colossal nose that sucks up everything in its path.

episodes.name: Diaper Daddy
episodes.overview: When everyone is tired of changing Baby's nappies, Handy decides to invent a robot that will do the job.

episodes.name: Smurf-Fu
episodes.overview: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a giant snake, the other Smurfs ask her to teach them "Smurf-Fu".

episodes.name: Who's Heftier?
episodes.overview: Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident.

episodes.name: Where's Papa Smurf?
episodes.overview: Because of a mishap, Papa Smurf disappears and the only way to make him visible again is to get a whisker from Azrael

episodes.name: Mind the Cat
episodes.overview: Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free.

episodes.name: DRIIINNGGGGG!
episodes.overview: Lazy Smurf no longer wants to miss important moments in village life.

episodes.name: The Scariest Smurf
episodes.overview: On Halloween, Scaredy Smurf finds himself transformed into a monster and wreaks havoc in the village.

episodes.name: Clumsy Not Clumsy
episodes.overview: Gargamel tempts Clumsy with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear.

episodes.name: Unsmurfable Smile
episodes.overview: Smurfette and Blossom try to make Grouchy smile by taking him on a camping trip.

episodes.name: Jokes on You
episodes.overview: Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to booby trap it with an even bigger explosion.

episodes.name: Smurfs in Disguise
episodes.overview: After breaking Papa Smurf's telescope, Scaredy and Hefty decide to dress up as girls and hide rather than face punishment.

episodes.name: Smurf Your Seat Belts!
episodes.overview: When Handy and Storm discover Gargamel's plan to make Azrael fly, they build their own flying machines.

episodes.name: Alien Smurf
episodes.overview: An alien child visits the Smurfs and puts them under his spell in order to make them his friends.

episodes.name: My Smurf the Hero
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets tired of being scared and he dons a superhero costume to conquer his fear.

episodes.name: Leaf It Alone
episodes.overview: When the Sarsaparilla harvest is ruined by a pest, the Smurfs discover Gargamel's plan to lure them to his field.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Smurfy
episodes.overview: When Dimwitty finds an egg in the woods, he and the other Smurfs put their parenting skills to the test.

episodes.name: The Pluffs! (1)
episodes.overview: Brainy and Smurfblossom enter a universe where the Smurfs are mean and Gargamel and Azrael are kind.

episodes.name: The Makeover
episodes.overview: Vanity convinces Tailor Smurf to make a new outfit for the Smurfs. After Jokey gets a hold of it, he and a few other Smurfs greatly change it up, which causes Vanity to accuse Tailor of being a bad Tailor, which causes them to fight in an all-out war. Other Smurfs begin rooting for one or the other and abandon their clothes until a new outfit is made.

episodes.name: The Pluffs! (2)
episodes.overview: Brainy and Smurfblossom enter a universe where the Smurfs are mean and Gargamel and Azrael are kind.

episodes.name: The Majestic 5
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf decides to organize an election that will appoint the Smurfs who will be part of the Special Brigade responsible for defending the village. The chosen ones are Dimwitty, Lazy, Scaredy, Clumsy, and Baby. When Gargamel attacks the village and captures all the Smurfs, except the five chosen ones, they have to get along and save their friends.

episodes.name: Kitchen Klutz
episodes.overview: After Clumsy saves Chef from a large rock, he lets Clumsy cook for the Smurfs, but he doesn't do a very good job.

episodes.name: Chef Soup
episodes.overview: Chef leaves the village after Brainy criticizes his cuisine. He goes to cook for the ogres, but they aren't satisfied. Meanwhile, the other Smurfs attempt to replace Chef.

episodes.name: The Round Up
episodes.overview: Jokey gives Farmer's racing snails a potion to make them super fast. However, the snails continue their race out of the village - without Chef, Smurfstorm and Hefty on them, so Jokey has to go look for them in the forest.

episodes.name: Adventures in Smurfsitting
episodes.overview: Clumsy and Dimwitty destroy Chef's lunch for the other Smurfs, making them feel like they're useless. They want the others to feel like they're both helpful in the village, so they are tasked with taking care of Baby. Baby wanders off into the forest and the duo has to save him from various dangers like Bigmouth and Gargamel.

episodes.name: Waffle Wednesday
episodes.overview: Chef Smurf becomes jealous of Smurflily when she starts making waffles that are better than his. He tries to find ways to figure out what her secret is- which backfires and creates “Pancake Friday”. He ends up going crazy and tries to drive her truck off a cliff.

episodes.name: Smurfy Day Care
episodes.overview: Storm has to become a super smurfsitter when all of the Smurfs turn back into babies.

episodes.name: Funny Mommy
episodes.overview: Jokey transforms Poet into Gargamel's mom, but they find themselves trapped in Gargamel's hovel.

episodes.name: Smurfy Secrets (1)
episodes.overview: When Brainy learns that Gargamel is trying to transform into a Smurf, he puts a new security protocol in place: the Smurfs must share one of their secrets to prove their identity.

episodes.name: Smurfy Secrets (2)
episodes.overview: When Brainy learns that Gargamel is trying to transform into a Smurf, he puts a new security protocol in place: the Smurfs must share one of their secrets to prove their identity.

episodes.name: Crashing Gargamel's Party
episodes.overview: Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Smurfbegonia that he has become kind, so they invite him to the village to celebrate a big party in his honor.

episodes.name: Fake News
episodes.overview: Jokey decides to trick Poet into writing a fake article to make Smurf newspapers popular, unintentionaly triggering panic in the village.

episodes.name: Storm Loses her Mojo
episodes.overview: Storm misplaces her warrior spirit.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Smurfs' Treasure
episodes.overview: Farmer and Vanity find a chest with a magical jewel that brings bad luck to everyone who touches it. Unfortunately, Farmer, Brainy, Jokey and Hefty touch it, so they want to bury it to reverse the spell, but Vanity takes the jewel obsessed with it.

episodes.name: Pop Out
episodes.overview: Gargamel casts a spell on Grouchy so that whatever he complains about appears in his hovel. When Jokey finds this out, he starts using him to get rid of some things, but not everything is good to disappear.

episodes.name: The Smurfs Show (1)
episodes.overview: Baby receives a teddy bear from Gargamel, but that toy has a camera in its eye, which allows Gargamel to spy on them with the help of crystal ball. When the Smurfs find that out, they make up a fake story to trap the evil wizard.

episodes.name: The Smurfs Show (2)
episodes.overview: Baby receives a teddy bear from Gargamel, but that toy has a camera in its eye, which allows Gargamel to spy on them with the help of crystal ball. When the Smurfs find that out, they make up a fake story to trap the evil wizard.

episodes.name: Smurfboards
episodes.overview: Vanity and Jokey start smurfboarding around the village and Brainy believes they're dangerous trying to teach them the "Highway Code" (safe type of boarding), but he does not get a lot of respection from them.

episodes.name: Forget Me What?
episodes.overview: When Brainy, Dimwitty and Clumsy are chased by Gargamel, Brainy uses the "flower of oblivion" to make evil wizard lose his memory. Then, he befriends Gargamel, but Azrael will try to find ways to return his master's memory.

episodes.name: Knight Smurfalot
episodes.overview: After watching a play about a knight, Dreamer wants to be a knight, so he takes some tools and plays a rescuer around the village - which make some Smurfs angry and they try to stop him.

episodes.name: Lab Assistant
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf takes the Monkey as his assistant due to Brainy's injury, but Brainy and Monkey goes into a war when Monkey turns out to be better assistant.

episodes.name: Leaping Lizards
episodes.overview: When Vanity notices that he has a pimple on his nose, he breaks into Papa Smurf's lab and steals a lotion to get rid of that pimple, but it turns him into a fire-breathing lizard.

episodes.name: Smurfy Mother's Day!
episodes.overview: While they have been captured by Gargamel, Papa Smurf, Willow and Vanity offer to help Gargamel impress his mother for her birthday.

episodes.name: Flying Ace
episodes.overview: After causing another accident, Clumsy starts believing that the sky is only place where he could not be clumsy, so he asks Handy to teach him how to fly a plane.

episodes.name: Monkey See, Monkey Do
episodes.overview: The magical supply store mixes up orders from Gargamel and Papa Smurf and the latter receives a monkey.

episodes.name: Cover Story
episodes.overview: In search of the scoop of the century for his newspaper, Reporter Smurf attempts to interview Gargamel.

episodes.name: Order of Merit
episodes.overview: Jokey decides to teach Brainy a good lesson because of his actions, inventing an imaginary medal that only rewards the best Smurfs called the "merit medal" - and Brainy would do anything to get it.

episodes.name: Mirror, Mirror on the Armoire
episodes.overview: Gargamel leaves a magic cabinet that imprisons anyone who looks into its mirror in the forest. Unfortunately, Vanity brings it to the village and every Smurf gets locked up, so the narcissistic Vanity must find the way to free them.

episodes.name: Smurfing Places
episodes.overview: Gargamel exchanges bodies with Papa Smurf and locks Papa into a cage while he goes to the Smurf village. Timid finds out what happens and he's only one who can help Papa escape.

episodes.name: Papa Times Two
episodes.overview: A generic Smurf wants to feel important and respected, so Vanity gives him a makeover that he now looks like Papa Smurf, but he will have to learn what it is to have responsibilities.

episodes.name: You're Fired!
episodes.overview: After another incident, Clumsy and Dimwitty argue and leave the fire brigade. When Smurfette takes their place and does a remarkable job, the two jealous Smurfs unite to pressure her to quit.

episodes.name: Poet Slam
episodes.overview: After Poet introduces Smurflily to the art of poetry and rhyme, they agree to face each other on a poetry contest, but Poet gets the "white rhyme anxiety", which badly affects his poetic knowledge.

episodes.name: Where's My Smurfway?
episodes.overview: When Blossom misplaces Brainy's beloved smurfway, she has to find it before Brainy finds out.

episodes.name: A Thief Among Us!
episodes.overview: When the Smurfs' favorite things start disappearing all over the village, everyone gets worried and suspicious.

episodes.name: Manners Matter
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf is nervous about the new Nature Fairy coming to visit so he asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners.

episodes.name: The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave
episodes.overview: After Wild sprains his ankle, he stays in Papa Smurf's house to recuperate while Papa Smurf is away.

episodes.name: The Talented Justa Smurf
episodes.overview: Justa Smurf, surrounded by others who are all Something Smurf, is still searching for his calling. Later, he finds a new talent in mimicking.

episodes.name: Mommy's Masterpiece
episodes.overview: When the other Smurfs bale out of posing for Painter's masterpiece, he finds a new subject in Gargamel's mom.

episodes.name: Smurf, Yes Smurf!
episodes.overview: While Papa Smurf is away, Brainy uses a potion to get the village to obey his every whim.

episodes.name: Say Smurf for the Camera!
episodes.overview: Handy invents a camera so Painter can make portraits of all the village's inhabitants.

episodes.name: Ogre Love (1)
episodes.overview: When Smurfette removes a splinter from Bigmouth's thumb, he immediately falls in love with her and follows her to the village.

episodes.name: Ogre Love (2)
episodes.overview: When Smurfette removes a splinter from Bigmouth's thumb, he immediately falls in love with her and follows her to the village.

episodes.name: Back To Nature
episodes.overview: Vanity, Poet, and Dimwitty get lost in the forest during a harvest.

episodes.name: Shell Game
episodes.overview: Gargamel changes into a snail so that Farmer leads him to the Smurfs' village.

episodes.name: Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb
episodes.overview: Brainy invents the "Smurf scale". However, instead of weighing his brain, the machine makes Brainy totally stupid.

episodes.name: Blossom Goes Wild!
episodes.overview: After a big argument with Storm and Lily, Blossom announces that she is leaving the Girls' Village and is going to live with Wild Smurf.

episodes.name: Smurfette Overdoes It!
episodes.overview: Doing too much, Smurfette is very tired. To teach her the art of doing nothing, Papa Smurf entrusts her to the greatest specialist: Lazy.

episodes.name: Okey-Dokey!
episodes.overview: Jokey uses a potion that makes Grouchy say "okidoki!" to everything.

episodes.name: Curing Private Timid
episodes.overview: Convinced that Timid admires him, Hefty decides to take him under his wing, in order to teach him self-confidence.

episodes.name: Soufflé Shuffle
episodes.overview: When Chef twists his ankle after an argument with Greedy, he finds himself with no one to help him carry his soufflé to the Spring Festival. Greedy offers but Chef is afraid that he will eat the soufflé before arriving.

episodes.name: Smurfy Magic Duel
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf and Willow challenge each other in a magic duel.

episodes.name: No Smurf Out!
episodes.overview: Because Scaredy is afraid that a ghost is haunting his house, he asks Handy to make it secure. Too well secured, he find himself locked in his house, with Brainy, Blossom, and Chef.

episodes.name: Papa Smurf Leaves the Nest
episodes.overview: While Papa Smurf is preparing a potion to cure his voice loss, a sparrow enters his lab and accidentally switches bodies with him.

episodes.name: The Stolen Portrait
episodes.overview: Someone has stolen Painter's painting and all the Smurfs are looking for it. While the artist is in despair, Smurfette confuses the culprit for Gargamel.

episodes.name: Lost Cat
episodes.overview: Azrael has had enough of Gargamel and leaves the hovel! Only, once in the forest, he gets injured and is picked up by Wild.

episodes.name: Baby Sensei
episodes.overview: Smurfette and the students in her Smurf-Fu class mistakenly mistake Baby Smurf for the Smurf-Fu guru who will guide them to the next level.

episodes.name: The Magic Pumpkin
episodes.overview: On Halloween, Smurfette gives Wimpy Smurf a magic pumpkin that makes him terrifying, only the pumpkin isn't actually magic at all.

episodes.name: The Star Smurf
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf gives Harmony a potion that charms his audience during a concert. However, Harmony forces the dose and the Smurfs turn into hysterical fans.

episodes.name: Papa Smurf's Ghost
episodes.overview: Brainy is busy helping prepare for an event in which Papa Smurf is going to perform, but he wants to control everything so much that he horrifies everyone, including Papa Smurf. To get back at him, Painter and Chef prepare a prank, but it backfires.

episodes.name: "Snails On Strike!"
episodes.overview: Tired of their life, Farmer's snails go on strike and join Wild to share his free and unconstrained life. However, they lost an essential thing when they left the farm, something that only Farmer can give them...

episodes.name: Don't Wake The Sleeping Wizard!
episodes.overview: When Gargamel arrives at the Smurfs' village in the middle of the night asleep, Papa Smurf realizes that the wizard is a sleepwalker. The Smurfs take the opportunity to "have fun" with their sworn enemy.

episodes.name: The Pumpkin Rally
episodes.overview: During the first mixed pumpkin rally, Hefty, undisputed champion of previous editions, shows off like a macho, much to the annoyance of Storm, who is determined to show him that a girl can beat him. However, the two have uncompetitive teammates: Blossom and Dimwitty.

episodes.name: The Cheating Smurf
episodes.overview: When Storm puts Greedy in trouble during a contest for the biggest waffle eater, Greedy cheats and wins. Very quickly overwhelmed by remorse, he concocts a potion of oblivion of his own, which brings out two doubles.

episodes.name: The Smurfing Machine In Time (1)
episodes.overview: After an accident, Blossom and Handy are sent to prehistoric times, where a monkey steals their time cuckoo clock.

episodes.name: The Smurfing Machine In Time (2)
episodes.overview: After an accident, Blossom and Handy are sent to prehistoric times, where a monkey steals their time cuckoo clock.

episodes.name: Rock 'N' Smurf!
episodes.overview: The Smurf Orchestra is to give a concert for Willow in honor for her birthday. But when Slammy, the singer and leader of the group, behaves like a diva, she is replaced by another diva: Vanity. Slammy is determined the concert won't happen without her, and nearly ruins Willow's birthday.

episodes.name: Gagargamel
episodes.overview: Because of an inadvertently absorbed love, Gargamel falls madly in love with Leaf and no longer wants to leave her. The Smurfs come to the rescue of the fairy to rid her of her suitor.

episodes.name: Smurf Me Your Blanket!
episodes.overview: After losing his favorite pillow, Lazy loses his legendary sleep and borrows Baby's blanket to try it.

episodes.name: Loosened Smurf
episodes.overview: Fascinated by the talkative Blossom, Timid dreams of becoming her friend. However, he doesn't dare speak to her. Desperate, he begs Papa Smurf for help. With a dose of his "unstuck-Smurf" potion, Timid is transformed into a Confident Smurf! But his new personality doesn't have the desired effect on Blossom.

episodes.name: The Bet
episodes.overview: Provoked by Storm and her legendary competitiveness, Smurfette embarks on a betting escalation.

episodes.name: Like A Smurf In Dough!
episodes.overview: When Wild steals their cupcakes, Begonia, Lily, and Blossom decide to teach him a lesson.

episodes.name: You Don't Smurf With Love!
episodes.overview: Persuaded to be an expert in love, Dreamer uses all the great clichés of romance novels to unite two Smurfs whose couple is more than unlikely -- Papa Smurf and Willow.

episodes.name: "Sarsaparilla Festival"
episodes.overview: On the occasion of the Sarsaparilla festival, Chef, Brainy, Dimwitty, and Greedy are in the forest, without seeing that Gargamel bewitched the sarsaparilla fields.

episodes.name: Clumsy's Circus
episodes.overview: When Clumsy convinces himself that he must become an acrobat at all costs to better manage his clumsiness, the Smurfs create a fake circus company to make his dream come true.

episodes.name: Family Time
episodes.overview: Gargamel confiscates Dwayne and Rowena's toys; in revenge, they free the Smurfs their uncle had captured.

episodes.name: Smurf vs Machine
episodes.overview: Jealous of DD's abilities, Handy builds himself a supercharged exoskeleton, which malfunctions and DD is the only one who can save him.

episodes.name: See Gargamel Run
episodes.overview: Smurfstorm unknowingly leads Smurflily and Smurfblossom into a trap when she enlists their help to drive Gargamel out of the forest forever.

episodes.name: Hefty Baby
episodes.overview: Hefty Smurf unwittingly changes bodies with Baby Smurf when Smurfstorm challenges him.

episodes.name: Dragon Pet
episodes.overview: Rowena casts a spell on Voltaire that forces him to obey her orders.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Prank
episodes.overview: When one of Jokey's pranks goes wrong, the Smurfs are all turned to pebbles.

episodes.name: Rowena's Plant
episodes.overview: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help Rowena cure her plant; they don't know that it's all a scam to capture Smurfs.

episodes.name: What a Doll
episodes.overview: Rowena turns Vanity and Storm into dolls.

episodes.name: The Great Smurf Games (1)
episodes.overview: Clumsy is desperate to take part in the Great Smurf Games and win the prize, which is a magic sphere that grants a wish to the winner.

episodes.name: The Great Smurf Games (2)
episodes.overview: Clumsy is desperate to take part in the Great Smurf Games and win the prize, which is a magic sphere that grants a wish to the winner.

episodes.name: I Want a Dragon
episodes.overview: Tired of not being able to defend himself, Wimpy decides having a dragon would solve his problems.

episodes.name: Magic Meltdown
episodes.overview: Chef uses a cauldron from Papa Smurf's lab and accidentally brings it to life.

episodes.name: His Own Worst Enemy
episodes.overview: Brainy accidentally gives Gargamel the idea to clone himself to increase his odds of catching Smurfs.

episodes.name: The Tree of Knowledge
episodes.overview: The Smurfs think they have found the famous Tree of Knowledge mentioned in a legend and all rush to ask it for advice. They do not know that it is actually Dimwitty, stuck inside a hollow trunk.

episodes.name: A Star for Papa Smurf
episodes.overview: After breaking Papa Smurf's telescope, Monkey wants to repair his mistake and goes in search of a star.

episodes.name: The Shock Team
episodes.overview: Dwayne finds Handy's jet pack in the forest and takes it to make his own. Handy must then put together a team to go get it from Gargamel, but the only Smurfs available are not the ones Handy was thinking of...
